html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2023-12182023-12-08PSPC
ActFederal Prompt Payment for Construction Work Act
SubjectOrder Designating Provinces Under Subsection 6(1) of the Federal Prompt Payment for Construction Work Act
PrecisORDER DESIGNATING PROVINCES UNDER SUBSECTION 6(1) OF THE FEDERAL PROMPT PAYMENT FOR CONSTRUCTION WORK ACT in order to designate Ontario, Saskatchewan and Alberta as having enacted a reasonably similar regime for payment of contractors and subcontractors, and a reasonably similar adjudication regime in case of non-payment, taking into account the criteria set out in section 2 of the Federal Prompt Payment for Construction Work Regulations (Criteria, Time Limits, Interest and Circumstances).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0270 Publication Date: 2023-12-20
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: ORDER DESIGNATING PROVINCES UNDER SUBSECTION 6(1) OF THE FEDERAL PROMPT PAYMENT FOR CONSTRUCTION WORK ACT in order to designate Ontario, Saskatchewan and Alberta as having enacted a reasonably similar regime for payment of contractors and subcontractors, and a reasonably similar adjudication regime in case of non-payment, taking into account the criteria set out  in section 2 of the Federal Prompt Payment for Construction Work Regulations (Criteria, Time Limits, Interest and Circumstances).
